Class DBController

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class DBController
extends java.lang.Object
    Database Controller to get data from DBLibrary for all controller

        public boolean editPersonalProfile(java.lang.String userName,
                                   java.lang.String firstName,
                                   java.lang.String lastName,
                                   java.lang.String password)
        This method allows the user to edit their own personal profile information.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name to change the old first name to
        lastName - the last name to change the old last name to
        password - the password to change the old password to
        username - the user's userName
        Returns:
        true if edit successfully
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if account cannot be found

      • addUniversity

        public boolean addUniversity(java.lang.String school,
                             java.lang.String state,
                             java.lang.String location,
                             java.lang.String control,
                             int numberOfStudents,
                             int percentFemales,
                             int SATVerbal,
                             int SATMath,
                             int expenses,
                             int percentFinancialAid,
                             int numberOfApplicants,
                             int percentAdmitted,
                             int percentEnrolled,
                             double academicsScale,
                             double socialScale,
                             double qualityOfLifeScale,
                             java.lang.String[] popMajors)
        This method add a specific university - admin only.
        Parameters:
        schoolName - university to update
        state - which is new to update
        location - which is new to update
        control - which is new to update
        numOfStu - which is number of students to update
        perFem - which is percentage of female to update
        satVerbal - which is sat verbal score to update
        satMath - which is sat math score to update
        price - which is expense to update
        finAid - which is financial aid student can get from school to update
        numOfApp - which is number of applicants to update
        perAdmit - which is percentage of admit to update
        perEnroll - which is percentage of enroll to update
        control - which is new to update
        academicScale - which is scale of acedmic to update
        socialScale - which is scale of social to update
        lifeScale - which is scale of life to update
        popMajor - which is the emphases majors of this school to update
        Returns:
        true if it successfully

      • searchResults

        public java.util.List<University> searchResults(java.lang.String schoolName,
                                                java.lang.String state,
                                                java.lang.String location,
                                                java.lang.String control,
                                                int numOfStuStart,
                                                int numOfStuEnd,
                                                int perFemStart,
                                                int perFemEnd,
                                                int satVerbalStart,
                                                int satVerbalEnd,
                                                int satMathStart,
                                                int satMathEnd,
                                                int priceStart,
                                                int priceEnd,
                                                int finAidStart,
                                                int finAidEnd,
                                                int numOfAppStart,
                                                int numOfAppEnd,
                                                int perAdmitStart,
                                                int perAdmitEnd,
                                                int perEnrollStart,
                                                int perEnrollEnd,
                                                double academicScaleStart,
                                                double academicScaleEnd,
                                                double socialScaleStart,
                                                double socialScaleEnd,
                                                double lifeScaleStart,
                                                double lifeScaleEnd,
                                                java.lang.String[] popMajor)
        Method to return a list of universities with attributes that fit in the criteria entered by user - Kalila
        Parameters:
        schoolName - name of the school
        state - state of school
        location - location of school
        control - control of school
        numOfStu - number of students
        perFem - percentage of female
        satVerbal - sat verbal score
        satMath - sat math score
        price - expenses for university
        finAid - financial aid percentage
        numOfApp - number of applicants
        perAdmit - percentage of admitted students
        perEnroll - percentage of enroll
        academicScale - scale of academic life
        socialScale - scale of social life
        lifeScale - scale of life quality
        popMajor - the list of emphases for a specific school
        Returns:
        list of universities meet search conditions
